title: Table 167 - Row 18
clause_text: Whether area for inclusive housing is required as per Regulation No.3.8 ? Please state the details.: (c) Whether the ramps to the basement are provided leaving 6.0 m. marginal distance for movement of fire fighting vehicle ? | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No.
